definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
everything is fine except for one small defect (idiom); the fly in the ointment

sentences.english: They covered every single topic in the US-China relationship.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈到了美中关系的每一个话题。

sentences.english: There has been no official confirmation of the incident from either country's military.
sentences.chinese: 目前美中两国军方都还没有对这一事件作出正式证实。

sentences.english: Amid all the pomp and celebration, one of the darker aspects to the wedding was how thin she was too.
sentences.chinese: 围绕着盛况和庆典，美中不足的一点是，新娘太瘦了。

sentences.english: Imagist poetry exists in both American and Chinese history of literature.
sentences.chinese: 意象诗是美中两国诗歌史上一个十分相近的诗歌现象。

sentences.english: Once again the U. S. and Chinafind themselves in a spat over the Chinese currency, the yuan.
sentences.chinese: 美中两国再次因人民币问题陷入口角之争。

sentences.english: The weakness is that it takes its crusading a little far.
sentences.chinese: 而美中不足的是在进行讨伐鞭挞的时候走的有点远了。

sentences.english: I am very glad beautiful in between the economic ligament of growth talks about a few.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴就美中之间增长的经济纽带谈几句。
唐纳也对美中关系发表评论。

sentences.english: In the current U.S.-China feud, both sides have ample grounds to get their dander up.
sentences.chinese: 在目前的美中纠纷中，双方都有足够的理由发怒。

sentences.english: Two generations ago, citizens of the United States and China were not able to visit the other country.
sentences.chinese: 在上两代人中，美中两国的公民们还不能相互访问。

sentences.english: Both competition and co-operation will feature in U.S.-China bilateral ties in the 21st century.
sentences.chinese: 21世纪的美中双边关系既有竞争又有合作。

sentences.english: Ping pong diplomacy played an important role in the history of U.S.-China relations.
sentences.chinese: 乒乓外交在美中关系史中发挥了重要作用。

sentences.english: Both the Untied States and China have taken important measures in dealing with climate change.
sentences.chinese: 美中两国为应对气候变化分别采取了重要行动。

sentences.english: Imagine a US-China renewable energy initiative, along the lines of the US-Soviet space station.
sentences.chinese: 试着沿美苏空间站的思路想象美中可再生能源倡议。

sentences.english: The pavilion, like our consulate, represents the spirit of US-China partnership.
sentences.chinese: 和领馆一样，美国馆代表了美中伙伴关系的精神。

sentences.english: The ointment contains polymixin B and oxytetracycline in a petroleum base.
sentences.chinese: 美中不足包含在一个多粘菌素B和石油基地土霉素。

definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
